CECexpo is a professional exhibition organization which specified in organizing Chinese exhibitors to participate the exhibitions worldwide. The company was established in 1988 and transformed into a limited liability company in 2001. Its main business involves exhibition, advertising and design.CES 2017

CIROSChinan/aThe China International Robot Show (CIROS) organizes exhibitions for the Chinese robotics sector that cross-promotes the global robotics sector with innovation and entrepreneurship in the enormous Chinese marketplace. Sponsors, buyers, researchers and funders will converge in Shanghai to explore the latest developments in robotics for industrial manufacturing, service and other applications. The CIROS is the official exhibition platform of the China Robot Industry Alliance and the top professional robot exhibition of all robotics activities in China. CIROS is also the only Chinese Robotics exhibition supported by the International Federation of Robotics (IFR);High quality and professional buyer group;As the first and only professional exhibition covering the whole product chain of the Chinese robotics sector, CIROS attracts attention not only from mainstream brands of the robotics industry at home and abroad, but also from the users and buyers in the global robotics sector. Top class summit and specialized technology forum in the global robotics industry;CIROS has always been unanimously recognized by government organizations, related experts and exhibitors at home and abroad for the combination of professional exhibition and international high-level conference. Prestigious Sponsors and professional management groups;CIROS is supported by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and the Ministry of Science and Technology of the People’s Republic of China. Together with the China Machinery Industry Federation (CMIF), China Robot Industry Alliance (CRIA) and CMEPO Exhibition Co., Ltd. (CMEPO), CIROS is jointly hosted with some main robotics industry organizations both domestic as abroad such as IFR, VDMA, JARA, KAR, TAIROA. The committee of CIROS thoroughly understands the traits of China’s robotics industry, and is familiar with the domestic machinery industry, raw material industry, light industry and electronic information industry. Moreover, the committee of CIROS thoroughly gets a better understanding of the robot industry capacity and the demand of its applications, which will promote the communication and spares no effort to give impetus to the success of CIROS2015. Results of CIROS 2014;With a total exhibition space of 16,000 m 2 and 38,572 professional visitors, CIROS 2014 was the largest robot exhibition of China. More than 216 exhibitors, accounting for nearly two-thirds of all robotics industry enterprises of China, participated in CIROS 2014. Some facts about CIROS 2014;16,000 m 2 exhibition space, year-on-year rise of 45.4%;216 exhibitors, 96 new exhibitors, year-on-year rise of 80%;38,572 professional visitors and buyers from 18 countries and regions, year-on-year rise of 40.9%;3 international high-level conferences;10 specialized technology forums and matchmaking symposiums;9 exhibitor pavilions;12 professional buyer groups;153 cooperative media with 112 industry media and 41 public media;1040 pieces of exhibition related reports;Exhibitoin Facts;Host;- China Machinery Industry Federation (CMIF);- China Robot Industry Alliance (CRIA);- CMEPO Exhibition Co., Ltd. (CMEPO);Organizer;- CMEPO Exhibition Co., Ltd. (CMEPO);Supporter;- International Federation of Robotics (IFR);Special Co-Organizers;- Japan Robot Association (JARA);- Korea Association of Robot Industry (KAR);- Nikkan Kogyo Shimbun Ltd. - Taiwan Automation Intelligence and Robotics Association (TAIROA);Overseas Supporters;- Verband Deutscher Maschinen- und Anlagenbau (VDMA);- Robotics Industries Association (RIA);Media Partner;- Robotics Today

Quanta ComputerTaiwanListedEstablished in 1988, Quanta Computer is the largest notebook computer ODM company in the world. With leading technology and strong R&D capability, Quanta has become a leader in hi-tech markets and the best partner providing quality design and manufacturing services to top-notched brands worldwide for technology products. Besides continuous high growth, high quality and high value creation in notebook computers, Quanta has extended its businesses into enterprise network systems, home entertainment, mobile communication, automotive electronics and digital home markets. With revealing "Cloud Computing" as the center of business innovation and development, Quanta has been integrating resources and redefining business model to capture emerging growth opportunities.

fidentityUnknownPrivatefidentity makes compliant customer onboarding fast and convenient. Efficient onboarding is a key capability for established and new financial service providers since onboarding performance directly influences life time value of a customer. Our key feature is a compliant out of the box onboarding process accessible from the browser which can be integrated and adapted with ease. We use the latest software frameworks to combine compliance know how and AI technology with superb UX. We provide three components for the onboarding process: 1) Forms to capture user information from FATCA to PEP status. 2) Identification module to capture and verify selfies and ID documents. 3) Signature module to enter into a binding contract. The modules can be used in a mix and match fashion to adapt to the specific use case. Main areas of application are 1) online onboarding and 2) digitization of assisted onboarding. Target customers are financial service providers from banks to crypto startups. fidentity was founded in late 2016 by Edi (tech) and Thorsten (business). Both are seasoned professionals in their respective fields and have worked together before embarking on the fidentity adventure. fidentity is a limited liability company incorporated in Switzerland with CHF 200k turn over in 2018 (up 10X from 2017). fidentity has been bootstrapped until now and is currently evaluating the right form of funding for the next growth steps.

results.title: China Electronics Corporation - Wikipedia
results.content: CN¥ 4.25 billion（2017） [1] Owner. People's Republic of China. Website. www .cec .com .cn. China Electronics Corporation ( Chinese: 中国电子信息产业集团; pinyin: Zhōngguó diànzǐ xìnxī chǎnyè jítuán, CEC) is a Chinese state-owned company and one of the largest producers of telecom equipment in China for both civilian and ...
results.raw_content:
Contents
China Electronics Corporation
China Electronics Corporation (Chinese: 中国电子信息产业集团; pinyin: Zhōngguó diànzǐ xìnxī chǎnyè jítuán, CEC) is a Chinese state-owned company and one of the largest producers of telecom equipment in China for both civilian and military purposes.[2][3][4]
History[edit]
CEC acquired the mobile phone division of Philips in 2007.[5][6] At the time, the Philips division had an annual revenue of 400 million euros and 240 employees.[7] CEC received the right to sell mobile phones under Philips license.[7]
Philips already moved its mobile phones production in China in 2001, when the production, research and development of mobile phones was taken by a joint-venture of Philips and China Electronics Corporation.[8] Romania was the first country in the European Union where such mobile phones were sold since 2013, until then the phones were available only in the BRIC states (Brazil, Russia, India and China).[9]
U.S. investment prohibition[edit]
In August, 2020, the United States Department of Defense published the names of companies with links to the People's Liberation Army operating directly or indirectly in the United States. CEC was included on the list.[10][11] In November 2020, Donald Trump issued an executive order prohibiting any American company or individual from owning shares in companies that the U.S. Department of Defense has listed as having links to the People's Liberation Army, which included CEC.[12][13]
